title: madava harE
sahitya:
mAdhava harE dharA vallabha padmanAbha mAmava bhaktihIna durlabha vAridAbha

anupallavi

 sAdhaka janAvana nirata krpAbharita sAgara shayana samsAra sAgarapOta

caraNam

 nIrajadala nEtra mAra kOmala gAtra nirjara vara muni sancaya stuti pAtra 
nIrajAsananuta dAnava kulA-amitra nirmalavana tulasI pUjita sattAmAtra
